Muhammad Zuhdi Fikri Johari

Welcome, my name is Fikri.

I am an Informatics Undergraduate Student at the Faculty of Computer Science at the Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta.

Find me on: LinkedIn Medium Github Google Scholar Podcast

Selamat datang, perkenalkan saya Fikri.

Saya adalah mahasiswa Informatika di Fakultas Ilmu Komputer, Universitas Amikom Yogyakarta.

Temui juga saya di: LinkedIn Medium Github Google Scholar Podcast


Current Activities

  • Research Assistant (remote). Building RagamBahasaID Platform as part of Grassroot Initiation for Collecting and Digitizing Indonesia Local Language Resources. Under Prof. Derry Wijaya Supervision, Boston University, US.
    — Part of Garuda ACE Research Collaboration program by DIKTI and LPDP, project I2: Collecting and Digitizing Datasets of Indonesia Local Languages.

  • Research Programmer. Involve in AMIKOM SILVANUS Research Group, focus on Computational Geo/Environmental Science Research Project for Wildland Forest Fire Management. Working with various data form related to spatial-geography data processing.
    — Part of SILVANUS Project, funded by EU Horizon 2020.

Research Interest

  • Machine Learning
  • Data Engineering
  • Data Mining
  • Natural Language Understanding
  • Recommender System
  • Data Discovery
  • Software Engineering
